title: (x) Lover font and baseline - Impact (italicized), (similar to) Agency Gothic {Ryan}
content:
can anyone id these 2? i thought lover might be impact just in italic but im not sure about the small type.

author: newbie_chez

comments.content: Well, you’re right about the first font being Impact italicized, but the small type seems to be something like Agency FB without anti-aliasing... it looks too misshapen to be a pixel font.
